Package org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.security.oauth2.resource

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AuthoritiesExtractor
    Strategy used by UserInfoTokenServices to extract authorities from the resource server's response.
    JwtAccessTokenConverterConfigurer
    Callback interface that can be used to provide additional configuration to the JwtAccessTokenConverter.
    JwtAccessTokenConverterRestTemplateCustomizer
    Callback for customizing the RestTemplate that is used to fetch the keys used by JwtAccessTokenConverter.
    PrincipalExtractor
    Strategy used by UserInfoTokenServices to extract the principal from the resource server's response.
    UserInfoRestTemplateCustomizer
    Callback for customizing the rest template used to fetch user details if authentication is done via OAuth2 access tokens.
    UserInfoRestTemplateFactory
    Factory used to create the OAuth2RestTemplate used for extracting user info during authentication if none is available.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultUserInfoRestTemplateFactory
    Factory used to create the OAuth2RestTemplate used for extracting user info during authentication if none is available.
    FixedAuthoritiesExtractor
    Default implementation of AuthoritiesExtractor.
    FixedPrincipalExtractor
    Default implementation of PrincipalExtractor.
    OAuth2ResourceServerConfiguration
    Auto-configure a Spring Security OAuth2 resource server.
    OAuth2ResourceServerConfiguration.ResourceSecurityConfigurer  
    OAuth2ResourceServerConfiguration.ResourceServerCondition  
    ResourceServerProperties
    Configuration properties for OAuth2 Resources.
    ResourceServerTokenServicesConfiguration
    Configuration for an OAuth2 resource server.
    ResourceServerTokenServicesConfiguration.JwkTokenStoreConfiguration  
    ResourceServerTokenServicesConfiguration.JwtTokenServicesConfiguration  
    ResourceServerTokenServicesConfiguration.RemoteTokenServicesConfiguration  
    ResourceServerTokenServicesConfiguration.RemoteTokenServicesConfiguration.SocialTokenServicesConfiguration  
    ResourceServerTokenServicesConfiguration.RemoteTokenServicesConfiguration.TokenInfoServicesConfiguration  
    ResourceServerTokenServicesConfiguration.RemoteTokenServicesConfiguration.UserInfoTokenServicesConfiguration  
    SpringSocialTokenServices
    ResourceServerTokenServices backed by Spring Social.
    UserInfoTokenServices
    ResourceServerTokenServices that uses a user info REST service.
